sentences.sentence: CORONAVIRUS  Chinese virologist claims she has proof coronavirus came from Chinese lab by · Sep 13th, 2020 9:06 am 24 Last Updated Sep 14th, 2020 at 1:34 am An escaped Chinese virologist plans to release evidence she says will prove that COVID-19 was manufactured in the Wuhan Institute of Virology.
"[T]he [meat] market in Wuhan … is a smokescreen and this virus is not from nature," said Dr. Li-Meng Yan on British ITV talk show on Friday .
"It comes from the lab — the lab in Wuhan and the lab is controlled by China's government."

Dr. Li-Meng Yan, who is reportedly hiding in the U.S. now, said she worked at the and a World Health Organization (WHO) reference lab , which included some of the earliest work on the virus, dating back to December 2019.
"The genome sequence is like a human finger print," Yan said.
"So based on this you can identify these things.I use the evidence … to tell people why this has come from the lab in China, why they are the only ones who made it."
Yan previously accused Beijing of lying about a killer bug , which also included a cover-up, she claims.
"[The Chinese government] deleted all my information," Yan said.
Yan also said the Chinese government recruited people "to spread rumors about me, that I'm a liar."
Yuan Zhiming, the director of the Wuhan Institute of Virology, previously denied the claims , telling state media in April, "There's no way this came from us."
